titles.title: EDI Reform Act of 1995

To amend title I of the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 to give preference in awarding economic development grants made in connection with community development loan guarantees to cities having high unemployment rates.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Banking and Financial Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Housing and Community Opportunity.

committee.name: House Committee on Banking and Financial Services

bill.summary: 2/22/1995--Introduced. EDI Reform Act of 1995 - Amends the Housing and Community Development Act to give economic development grant loan guarantee preference to high unemployment jurisdictions. Requires unemployment to be considered in allocating assistance under the proposed Community Opportunity Performance Fund.
